title.rendered: “IDF Successfully Prevents Terror Attack in Judea and Samaria: A Detailed Look into the Incident”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces thwarted a terror attack attempt in the Judea and Samaria Area

Following the initial report, two terrorists arrived at the Beit Anun junction in the Judea Division a short while ago, one of the terrorists tried to stab IDF soldiers who were present, the forces responded with gunfire and neutralized him.
Simultaneously, the additional terrorist opened fire towards the soldiers who responded with gunfire and neutralized him as well. Our forces sustained no injuries.

IDF forces are deployed in the area.

Attached is a photo of the weapon used by one of the terrorists: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC2104202449280486
